full_text: Abortion and "permitless carry" were once fringe preoccupations of a few lawmakers. Now they are mainstream among Texas Repulicans https://t.co/doyNm8V5f3

localize.full_text: 妊娠中絶と「無許可携帯」は、かつては一部の議員の過激な関心事でした。今ではテキサス州の下院議員の間で主流となっています。https://t.co/doyNm8V5f3
